content: With the Mani Bead equipped when Chilled (ice status effect has been maxed) your critical hit chance will moderately increase. This is mostly useful in Chapter 3, thanks to it being set in the icy area, The New West.
promot:
This is an excerpt from the file 'Mani_Bead.md', within the main section titled 'Mani Bead'.
The content is as follows:
With the Mani Bead equipped when Chilled (ice status effect has been maxed) your critical hit chance will moderately increase. This is mostly useful in Chapter 3, thanks to it being set in the icy area, The New West.
